elements.title: OVERALL RATING
elements.description: Trainer/Sonographer observes the trainee performing the ultrasound and indicates which describes the competence of the trainee in the scenario observed.

elements.name: question3
elements.html: Trainer/Sonographer uses the prompts below to provide comments on the traineeâ€™s performance in at least 3 areas.

elements.name: preoperativePreparation
elements.title: Communication
elements.description: Introduces self, establishes rapport, checks patient record, clearly explains the ultrasound examination and obtains consent. Adjusts approach to attend to patient needs.

elements.name: proceduralSteps
elements.title: Preparation
elements.description: Appropriately positions patient; selects correct machine settings to optimise imaging, including depth, focus, time gain control (TGC), doppler angle, pulse repetition frequency (PRF).

elements.name: manualDexterity
elements.title: Manual Dexterity and Flow
elements.description: Demonstrates effective use of ultrasound probe and console, efficient procedure flow. Performs ultrasound examination using a systematic approach, switches between and uses the different imaging modes (B-mode, colour, spectral) effectively and appropriately.

elements.name: imagingAndRadiationSafety
elements.title: Interpretation of Imaging
elements.description: Recognises normal anatomy and common variants, and identifies vascular pathology. Detects relevant findings and determines accurate diagnosis.

elements.name: situationalAwareness
elements.title: Ultrasound Guided Procedure
elements.description: Demonstrates aseptic technique, performs procedure by using instruments appropriately, ensures patient is comfortable throughout and reassures them, effective communication to assistants/other team members.

elements.name: communication
elements.title: Record Keeping and Report Writing
elements.description: Updates record with all relevant/necessary information, produces a report/worksheet suitable to the intended audience clearly communicating findings and further management, if required.

elements.name: postoperative
elements.title: Postoperative
elements.description: Provides instructions for postoperative care; documents details of the procedure.

elements.name: generalComments
elements.title: General Comments on what was done well or what could be improved
